Source.Name: libxcomposite
Source.Summary: client library for the Composite extension to the X11 protocol
Source.Description: libXcomposite provides an X Window System client interface to the Composite extension to the X protocol. The Composite extension allows clients called compositing managers to control the final drawing of the screen. Rendering is done into an off-screen buffer.
